title: [CUDA10 fixes] Adds max plan number for CUDA 10 cufft plan cache array
body_html: @SsnL As per your review in #12017, I added a max plan number for CUDA 10 path. Our internal cuFFT team couldn't suggest a number since the limit depends on host/device memory. That is, a plan allocates some buffers on the device and also creates objects for the plans on the host side. I raised this number to 4x arbitrarily per you suggestion.

body: @SsnL As per your review in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/12017/, I added a max plan number for CUDA 10 path. Our internal cuFFT team couldn't suggest a number since the limit depends on host/device memory. That is, a plan allocates some buffers on the device and also creates objects for the plans on the host side. I raised this number to 4x arbitrarily per you suggestion.
